item.description:
ULTIMATE BILLIARDS PARTY UPDATE: We have a lot of people going to the party, including other groups and people from our ads. The Meetup people who RSVPed are listed on http://singles.meetup...

The $15 admission includes the cover charge ($5), Pool Tables ($5), Drink Specials (Priceless) and games and prizes so you can meet all the Central CT Singles! We will have all age groups there. At the front door, tell Ultimate Billiards you are here for the Central CT Singles party, and they will direct you to us, by the pool tables. The more people who arrive around 8pm, the more pool tables they will give us (They have 25 tables)

Tickets are $15 dollars and are available online or at the event.

Ultimate Billiards is directly off the Berlin Turnpike in the Food Mart + Ocean State Plaza, you will see their sign about Â½ mile from Home Depot/Sam?s Club in Berlin. The web site is www.UltimateBilliardsClub.com (or call (860) 828-7721

The Central CT Singles phone number is (860) 236-3343

See you at the party!


PLEASE RSVP ON THE CENTRAL CT SINGLES PAGE CLICK HERE

Central CT Singles would like to invite you to:

The Night Before Thanksgiving -Central CT Singles Music and Pool Party at:

Ultimate Billiards -151 Webster Square Road in Berlin, CT -across from Berlin Showcase Cinemas

Wednesday, November 21, 2007 at 8pm The biggest party night of the year!

Join Local Singles for a fun night at Ultimate Billiards with FREE Pool, Drink Specials, and LIVE Music with Diamondback

We will have FREE Pool Lessons and prizes all night long!

Tickets are $12 in advance, $15 at the door

Pay with Credit Card using the PayPal Button

Other Groups That Have Been Invited:

Central CT Singles
CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club
South Windsor Newly Single
Hartford Newly Single
IMS Singles

Click Here For Details

PLEASE RSVP ON CENTRAL CT SINGLES CLICK HERE
